description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Bomber is an arcade-style 2D shooter.  Shoot down airballoons with your tank and collect the goods to increase your rank! The game features 12 single-player levels and 4 unlockable challenges.
description.short: Bomber is an arcade-style 2D shooter.  Shoot down airballoons with your tank and collect the goods to increase your rank! The game features 12 single-player levels and 4 unlockable challenges.
